mapper.select: select m.m_email, m.m_name, m.m_address1, m.m_address2, m.m_address3, m.m_phone1, m.m_phone2, m.m_phone3, pc.pc_date from tbl_purchase pc left outer join tbl_member m on m.m_no=pc.m_no where pc_no=#{pc_no}
mapper.update: update tbl_purchase set pc_deliverystatus = 'true' where pc_no = #{pc_no}
update tbl_purchase set pc_deliverystatus = 'false' where pc_no = #{pc_no}
mapper.select: select pc_no from (select /*+INDEX_DESC(tbl_purchase pk_pc_no) */ rownum rn, pc_no from tbl_purchase where m_no=#{m_no}) where rn=1
select count(*) from tbl_purchase where pc_deliveryStatus ='false'
select count(*) from tbl_purchase where to_char(pc_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')=to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')

select sum(tbl_product.p_price * tbl_purchase_member.s_amount) from tbl_purchase left outer join tbl_purchase_member on tbl_purchase.pc_no=tbl_purchase_member.pc_no left outer join tbl_product on tbl_purchase_member.p_no=tbl_product.p_no where to_char(pc_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')=to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')
